question: ‘DEFCOM INDIA 2019’ is being held at which Indian city?
explanation: ‘DEFCOM INDIA 2019’ is being held at Manekshaw Centre in New Delhi from 26-27 November 2019. The theme for seminar is – ‘Communications: A Decisive Catalyst for Jointness’. The seminar is devoted to the seminal theme of leveraging communications for achieving jointness between three services.The prestigious DEFCOM journal was also released during the seminar. DEFCOM 2019 exhibition showcased cutting edge communication solutions from industry and gave officers from three services an opportunity to gain insights on technology and industry capabilities.
